attributes.action: Please support the Referendum result to leave the EU, deal or no deal.
attributes.additional_details: The meaningful vote number 2 should have taken place after the thirs and second votes last week, namely to extend article 50 and to take "no deal" off the table. People voted against meaningful vote number 2 because they preferred a no deal result. However they DO NOT want article 50 revoked. Please show support to continue with the Brexit process, deal or no deal.
attributes.background: We are hear constantly from the "opposition" to Brexit. there is a petition of over 1 million people suggesting Remain is the actual will of the people. Please join me in rallying to the cause. The Remainers will get a voice in Parliament, especially with the current speaker's allegiance.
